tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerSurveyData (
  survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  survey_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  touchpoint VARCHAR(255),
  satisfaction_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_surveys (
    survey_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    touchpoint_id UUID,
    survey_date DATE,
    satisfaction_score INT,
    comments STRING
)

CREATE TABLE touchpoints (
    touchpoint_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    touchpoint_name VARCHAR,
    touchpoint_type VARCHAR,
    touchpoint_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sales_funnel (
    funnel_stage VARCHAR,
    order_id UUID,
    customer_id UUID,
    touchpoint_id UUID,
    sales_rep_name VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    region VARCHAR(50) 
);

CREATE TABLE surveys (
    survey_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    feedback TEXT,
    rating INT,
    touchpoint VARCHAR(50),
    survey_date TIMESTAMPTZ 
);

CREATE TABLE customer_demographics (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE survey_responses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    survey_date DATE,
    satisfaction_score INT,
    feedback TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE touchpoints (
    touchpoint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    touchpoint_name VARCHAR(50),
    touchpoint_type VARCHAR(50),
    touchpoint_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sales_funnel (
    funnel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    funnel_stage VARCHAR(50),
    visit_date TIMESTAMP,
    conversion_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    feedback_date DATE,
    feedback_type VARCHAR(50),
    feedback_description TEXT
)
